body.name: Herobility Double Anti-Colic Baby Bottles – 8.5 fl oz/240ml – 4-Pack – BPA-Free - Multicolor – Sand, Woodchuck, Pink, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 28 mins
features: DEVELOPED BY PARENTS. APPROVED BY BABIES! Herobility walks you through parenting, supporting you and your child on the way. To us, babies and their parents are heroic. Facing new challenges and developing new skills on a daily basis. All products from Herobility are developed by parents and based on real-life experiences and struggles. Designed to give you a little extra superpower in your everyday life. Giving you a little extra Herobility!

AWARD-WINNING HERO BABY BOTTLES: All of Herobility’s products are designed in Sweden, developed by parents and approved by babies. Our hero bottles stayed at the top when tested by PriceRunner among the top 12 best baby bottles of 2022. Most convenient to use, comfortable to hold, easy to clean, and have a teat suitable for your baby.

UNIQUE DOUBLE ANTI-COLIC SYSTEM: This unique system provides doubled protection thanks to the ergonomically shaped teat that closes the corners of your baby’s mouth, stopping them from swallowing air. The air valves prevent a vacuum is formed inside the bottle.

ADORABLE TEAT THAT BABIES LOVE: We know it can be hard finding a bottle that your baby will like. Our teat has a unique breast-like shape that 97% of babies accept. All our baby bottles come with a teat: 140 ml/5 floz size S, 240 ml/8.5 floz size M and 340 ml/12 floz size L. You can also purchase Herobility teats in 5 different sizes separately.

SAFE MATERIALS & PACKAGING APPROACH: All Herobility products are free from BPA, BPS, and other harmful substances. To minimize our carbon footprint, shipping expenses, packaging waste, and to offer a priceworthy product for the customer, this bundle is packaged within a hygienic bag made from recyclable plastic material.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safe materials - BPA Free Wide opening for easy cleaning Designed in Sweden Accepted by 97% of babies

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Seals On These Bottles – No Leaks So Far
reviews.reviewText: I am pretty impressed with the quality of these anti-colic style baby bottles. They are very sturdy, durable, and have been leak proof so far. I like the soft material that the nipples are made out of, along with the nicely contoured shape. I think it fits a baby’s mouth much better. These all come with well-designed lids which make them very convenient for travel and storage. In this set they also provided strainer inserts that can be used to help with mixing formula. Using the inserts, the bottle kind of performs a like a shaker bottle, as it helps to break up the powder and accomplish better mixing. I think this four pack is a reasonable value, and because they are dishwasher safe, clean up is a piece of cake. I’m happy with them so far, and I think they would make a nice gift set as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sport style milk bottles
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are of 12oz capacity and holds good quantity. They have good grip and are leak proof. They fit properly into bottle warmer. The opening of bottle is wide for easy pouring and cleaning.Since these are big they will take more size in sanitizer bags .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Work great; priced high.
reviews.reviewText: This set of bottles works great; leakproof, easy to grasp onto for tiny hands, packable. The nipple is pretty typical and will be based on each babies preference of course. I do think the price is a little steep when there are brands with high recognition/quality priced similarly. Overall, nice set though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anti colic baby bottles
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are made of plastic and come in tan, brown, and two shades of pink. I’m not sure what the strainer like piece is supposed to be for, but it is not attached to the bottle in any way so it’s easily removable. The bottles all come with lids which is nice for packing a bottle for a short trip. You can use anti colic bottles for any baby. The listing says you can put them in the dishwasher or microwave although I probably would not do that. These would make a great gift for new parents

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality bottles
reviews.reviewText: This review is for Herobility Double Anti-Colic Baby Bottles – 12 fl oz/340ml – 4-Pack – BPA-Free - Multicolor – Sand, Woodchuck, Pink, WhiteThis four pack of baby bottles is a good value. The bottles are well made and hold up well to washing in the dishwasher. The double anti colic system feature makes these bottles a good choice for us. I also love the attractive colors of the bottles. No complaints for these, they're a good quality bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy Anti-Colic Baby Bottles
reviews.reviewText: I am really impressed with the quality and sturdiness of these 5fl oz Double Anti-Colic Baby Bottles. As a mom-to-be, I am truly looking forward to using these bottles with my baby. The colors are very nice and they are easy to clean and reuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are just ok in my opinion. My baby seems to prefer most other brands over these, not quite sure what it is. the nipple shape does appear different than some of the more well known brands. It may work better for some other babies, but it was a miss for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are great for my 1 year old. He has a bottle before bed and one when he wakes up. These are the perfect size for him. They wash easily, I usually put them in the dishwasher.I like that they come with an insert to help mix the milk powder.They don’t leak and fit together really well and easily.Love the 4 different colors.They have anti colic holes to help flow the air into the bottle and stop the nipple from being sucked in.I really recommend these bottles!
